column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////My husband and I both got the chicken biscuit.  We were disappointed. The breading looks thin but was heavy
column4: and tough.  I actually couldn't find the chicken inside
column6: it was dark meat. While I'm not a fan
column8: and he felt it was over-cooked and barely there too.  The portion was huge-could have done with one breast meat piece instead of 3? 4? large dark meat portions. We both enjoyed the biscuit and egg portion of the dish
column9: and agreed we would rather have had "chicken biscuit hold the chicken."
